isAbstract.fieldDescription: Indicates that the state represented by this state content node is an abstract state
isAbstract.name: ./isAbstractState

isSlug.fieldDescription: Indicates that the path segment represented by this state should be rendered as a slug whose data will later be accessible via the $stateParams service.
isSlug.name: ./isSlugState

isStructuralState.fieldDescription: Indicates that this state content node exists solely to provide structure to the state URL and should not be produced as part of the state rendering.
isStructuralState.name: ./isStructuralState
